title: The Official Ready Player One Soundtrack Mix Tape
description:
the "official" soundtrack mixtape for the book Ready Player One
based off the track list from Ernest Cline's website 
http://www.ernestcline.com/blog/2011/09/21/the-official-ready-player-one-soundtrack/

320k quality, no transcodes
for most of the tracks the original CD release version was used
if there was no CD issued around the time of original release I used the original vinyl rip or the first CD version available
remastered versions were avoided, except in cases where a high quality original version is too rare to track down (like the Ladyhawke, Wargames and Schoolhouse Rock soundtracks) 
"In Your Eyes" by Peter Gabriel was taken from the "Say Anything" soundtrack because boombox
the Monty Python And The Holy Grail End Music was extracted from the BluRay
the 'grouping' mp3 tag includes the name of the record label
